title: Cells
alt: Now, if it selectively kills cancer cells in a petri dish, you can be sure it's at least a great breakthrough for everyone suffering from petri dish cancer.
transcript:
[Caption above the panel:]
When you see a claim that a common drug or vitamin "kills cancer cells in a petri dish," 
keep in mind:[Cueball in a lab coat stands on a chair next to a desk, pointing a gun at a petri dish. There is a microscope on the desk.][Caption below the panel:]
So does a handgun.
